RelatedSentence: MILWAUKEE ( AP ) - Four congressmen are demanding answers from the Bureau of Alcohol , Tobacco , Firearms and Explosives about whether anyone has been held accountable for a botched , undercover guns and drugs operation in Milwaukee .

The congressmen , including Rep. Jim Sensenbrenner , a Wisconsin Republican , wrote Friday to ATF director B. Todd Jones asking why a supervisor in charge of the Milwaukee operation was not disciplined , but instead got a plum assignment , the Milwaukee Journal Sentinel reported Saturday .
